document_data.name: Shooting Stars
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shooting stars''''' was a special [[divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] and [[invocation]] [[quest spell]] from the [[combat sphere|combat]], [[Sun sphere|sun]], and [[weather sphere]]s that blasted an area with a number of small fireballs.
document_data.Effects: With this spell the caster created violent turbulence within a {{SI|120|ft|long=yes}} radius. A number of small electrically charged fireballs bombarded the area. In addition to this, a quartet of large ''shooting stars'' appeared that could be directed by the caster to specific targets. Any creature within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of one of the targets when it was struck by a ''shooting star'' was also harmed by fire.
document_data.Components: This spell did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind.
document_data.History: This spell was used by [[druid]]s who served [[Moander]] during the height of ancient [[Netheril]]'s power.
